title: Enrollment Status
description: The current state of the enrollment.

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: The name of the originator (user or system) of the data. This is informational only, do not use in business logic!

createdOn.title: Created On
createdOn.description: The date and time when the entity instance was created

modifiedBy.title: Modified By
modifiedBy.description: The name of the modifier (user or system) of the data. This is informational only, do not use in business logic!

modifiedOn.title: Modified On
modifiedOn.description: The date and time when the entity instance was last modified

id.title: ID
id.description: The global identifier of an enrollment status to be used in all external references to an enrollment status.

code.title: Code
code.description: The human readable code that identifies a enrollment status.

title.title: Title
title.description: The full name of an enrollment status.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of an enrollment status.
